long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An attendance manager light weight extension for your chrome browser to help students keep track of their attendance percentage in classes. To use simply create a class by clicking on add new class option. After successfully attending your class you can mark present in the extension if u failed to attend the class you can mark absent in extension and it will display the effect it has on your class percentage.
